meanings.definition: A person who operates a camera.
meanings.sent1: The camerapersons captured every moment of the wedding beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The camerapersons arrived early to set up their equipment.
meanings.sent3: The camerapersons joked about having eyes behind the lens.
meanings.sent4: The camerapersons were like silent observers, documenting life's events.
meanings.sent5: The camerapersons' skill in framing shots made the movie unforgettable.

meanings.definition: People who are responsible for filming events or scenes.
meanings.sent1: The camerapersons at the concert ensured every performance was recorded.
meanings.sent2: The camerapersons worked tirelessly to capture the action on set.
meanings.sent3: The camerapersons coordinated their shots like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: The camerapersons painted the world with light and motion.
meanings.sent5: The camerapersons' dedication brought the documentary to life.
